title: Wrapped Walk Ways, Project for Jacob L. Loose Memorial Park, Kansas City, Missouri
medium: fabric, graphite, charcoal, pastel, wax crayon, fabric sample, staples, and two photographs by Wolfgang Volz, on two sheets of paperboard in two parts
dimensions:
sheet (left panel): 71.1 x 55.9 cm (28 x 22 in.)
sheet (right panel): 71.1 x 55.9 cm (28 x 22 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 71.1 x 114.3 cm (28 x 45 in.)
creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
